title: Former Strictly professional Iveta Lukosiute pregnant after two miscarriages
text:
Iveta and her husband Jenya are expecting their second baby (Picture: Instagram/BBC)

Former Strictly Come Dancing professional Iveta Lukosiute is pregnant after suffering two miscarriages.

The 39-year-old announced the happy news on Twitter and Instagram, telling fans and friends that she and husband Jenya Raystes are expecting their second child.

Iveta posted a picture of herself and Jenya holding a picture of their baby scan and smiling.

She wrote: ‘After 2 years of unsuccessful tries and 2 consecutive miscarriages, we are happy to share that we are finally expecting a 2nd baby 😀👶.’

Iveta starred on Strictly until 2014 (Picture: BBC)

The dancer added the hashtags ‘#pregnant #parents #2ndbaby #alloveragain❤️ #happy #family #love’.

Followers gave their congratulations, while former Strictly pro Kristina Rihanoff wrote: ‘Congrats lovely’ and Dancing With The Stars professional Emma Slater commented: ‘Congratulations guys!!! So happy for you!’

Iveta and Jenya are already parents to son Vidas, who turned three in September.

Iveta welcomed son Vidas three years ago (Picture: Instagram)

Advertisement

Advertisement

The Lithuanian dancer appeared on the 10th, 11th and 12th series of Strictly Come Dancing, initially stepping in as a replacement for Aliona Vilani, who was injured while partnering with Johnny Ball.

Iveta was later partnered with Mark Benton and Thom Evans, but did not return for series 13 in 2015, although she competed in the 2014 Christmas special with Chris Hollins.

description: Former Strictly Come Dancing professional Iveta Lukosiute is pregnant after suffering two miscarriages.
